data.eml:eml: The identity of Maladera infuscata (Moser, 1915), with description of a new species from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Sericini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahrens, Dirk (2003): The identity of Maladera infuscata (Moser, 1915), with description of a new species from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Sericini). Zootaxa 392: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157034
